amendment.description: To impose additional requirements for improving automobile fuel economy and reducing vehicle emissions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1386 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 30. Record Vote Number: 310.

action.text: Amendment SA 1386 proposed by Senator Bond. (consideration: CR S9890-9893; text: CR S9890) To impose additional requirements for improving automobile fuel economy and reducing vehicle emissions.
